entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
